overview: a house.  two people.  there are.  they hover.  over the ground.  without moving.  in one direction.  a meteorite.  it diminishes them.  they deteriorate.  meteorites.  meteors.  Meteora. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: 1847 [floating through you]
